metadata.synopsis: Default dialogue with one of the civilians (female gnome near the docks) near the Sahuagin attack on a shore in the Lower City. This dialogue only gets added once the Sahuagin are defeated.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Use ReCon command "goto 52 3 -138"- "killcombat" to kill all the Sahuagin after they appear and attack.- Talk to this civilian near the docks:S_LOW_BeachSahuagin_Civilian_001_912002e8-480d-4039-a75d-fb2e2796976d

0.speaker: Rossina
0.text: Well, that could have gone a lot worse - thanks for that.
0.context: NodeContext: Relieved now the sahuagin monsters are dead

1.speaker: Rossina
1.text: Next time I might suggest we go for a walk somewhere else - away from any water.

2.speaker: Rossina
2.text: I have to admit being attacked by sea devils definitely isn't my best date - but it wasn't the worst, either.
2.context: NodeContext: Relived after the attack (and trying to cope with a little humour)

3.speaker: Rossina
3.text: Can't say I'm not expecting more of those sea devils to pop out of the water - let's hope they don't.
3.context: NodeContext: With a touch of mirth but also genuinely wary
